description:
Draft Note Design is seeking a diligent and organized Office Clerk to join our team. The Office Clerk will be responsible for a variety of administrative tasks to support the smooth operation of the office. This role requires strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to handle multiple tasks efficiently.

Pay

$19.50 - $31.00 per hour

Job

Full time

Responsibilities

  • Perform general office duties such as filing, photocopying, scanning, and faxing documents.
  • Maintain and update company records and databases.
  • Handle incoming and outgoing mail and packages.
  • Answer and direct phone calls to appropriate staff members.
  • Greet and assist visitors in a professional and friendly manner.
  • Manage office supplies and inventory, ensuring necessary items are stocked.
  • Assist with scheduling and coordinating meetings and appointments.
  • Prepare and distribute correspondence, reports, and other documents as needed.
  • Support other administrative tasks and projects as required.

Qualifications

  • High school diploma or equivalent.
  • Previous experience in an office environment is preferred.
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook).
  • Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Attention to detail and accuracy in data entry and record-keeping.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Professional appearance and demeanor.
  • Benefits
  • Competitive weekly salary, commensurate with experience and qualifications.
  • Comprehensive benefits package including health insurance, dental coverage, and retirement plans.
  • Paid time off and holidays.
  • Opportunities for professional development and growth within the company..
